Nurse: Alright, Mr. Reynolds. Please remember that you can ask me any questions at any time during our conversation. Nurse: I apologize for the confusion, Mr. Reynolds. Could you please confirm whether you're currently experiencing abdominal pain or not?

Patient: Sure. Go ahead.
